DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare cognitive inhibition deficit among depressed old suicide attempter compare depressed old suicide non-attempters .
DOC.brief_title: Study Cognitive Inhibition Disorders Depressed Older Suicide Attempters
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective consist examine association cognitive inhibition suicide attempt depress old adult ( > 65 year old ) .
DOC.criteria: Age > 65 year old Score MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) > 23 Score Hamilton Depression Scale > 27 For Group 1 ( depressed old suicide nonattempters ) : No history suicide attempt For Group 2 ( depressed old suicide attempter ) : History suicide attempt Neurological history medicalsurgical affection past 3 month . Dependence alcohol abuse . Use neuroleptic
